lumineth.title: Lumineth Assistive Smart Assisstive System for the Visually Impaired
lumineth.description: Built on a WebSocket-based server-client architecture for real-time communication: I designed a multimodal assistive wearable system that combines speech interfaces, helping blind users navigate urban environments. Developed real-time scene narration, obstacle detection, face recognition, emotion analysis, and more to help make user life easier.

images.alt: Tames presenting the product to other international students
Tames was welcomed home by school representatives

certificates.title: Singapore International STEM Innovation Challenge: Bronze medal

speech-detection.title: Synthetic Speech Detection via Multi-Generator GANs with Anomaly Detection Architectures
speech-detection.date: ICITEE 2025 • YSC 2025 • KVIS Final project• Thailand
speech-detection.description: Design an improved anomaly-based mGANs architecture (eD-AnoGAN and RES-mGANomaly) with high accuracy for diverse/generalized datasets to classify synthetic speech and human speech by imposing the multi-generator and latent consistency loss concept. Developed a baseline for adapting a multi-generator approach to human voice tasks, improving cybersecurity measures.

certificates.title: IEEE CIS Thailand Conference Presentation
certificates.issuer: IEEE Computational Intelligence Society Thailand Chapter

food-allergen.title: Food Allergen Warning Program
food-allergen.date: NSC 2024 • New Gen Inventors Award 2025 • Thailand
food-allergen.description: Developed a computer vision machine learning model that can accurately identify the type and ingredients of food from their images with an integrated database for user personalization and deploy using a sophisticated computer network model so users can access the program conveniently and efficiently. Reduced the risk of food consumption for individuals with food allergies, making their lives easier. Click here to visit the website.

certificates.title: Thailand New Gen Inventors Award: Silver Medal
Thailand New Gen Inventors Award: Popular Vote

global-league.title: Global Sports League Optimizer
global-league.description: Involved finding the optimal way to arrange the sport competition schedule to maximize fairness and other factors, which we used decision-based annealing optimization to tackle this problem. I am the leader of this 4-member project, nominated in the IMMC Mathematical model competition ,and received the Honorable Mention award. Noted that all work had been done under 120 hours time-limit.

certificates.title: International Mathematical Modeling Challenge (IMMC): Honorable Mention Award
High School Mathematical Contest in Modeling

go-kila.title: GO-KILA Sports Matchmaking Platform
go-kila.description: A sport matchmaking web platform, which is a start-up currently applying to the Shark Tank TV program. I am Responsible for the backend part, including database management, backend requests logic, website route design, matchmaking optimization based on their location, and team chat messages using websockets. Click here to visit the website.

enrollment-scanner.title: KVIS OPH Enrollment Scanner
enrollment-scanner.description: Involved scanning subject enrollment data from participants (approx. 2500 students) on paper into digital format for further statistical analysis using computer vision and machine learning like the YOLOv8 model and hosting the web on Flask for scalability. The head of this project, coordinating with teammates and teachers and designed the main model pipeline. Received overwhelmingly positive feedback. In the 2025 version, included the dewarp model to help detect the paper in any orientation, including semi-folded paper.

surveillance-optimization.title: Surveillance Coverage Optimizer
surveillance-optimization.description: Designed a ray-tracing, simulated annealing, and genetic programming workflow to maximise CCTV coverage for critical facilities.

certificates.title: High School Mathematical Contest in Modeling: Honorable Mention award.

stock-predictor.title: S&P 500 Stock Market Prediction
stock-predictor.description: Developed a predictive model for the S&P 500, the biggest US stock market, using various ML models and ensemble methods such as XGBOOST, CATBOOST, and random forest, along with rolling windows and various data preprocessing procedures.

jstp.title: Junior Science Talent Project (JSTP-SCB)
jstp.description: This program aims to nurture the high school students to achieve scientific, technological, and innovation mindset. Be a senior student mentor for the selection camp of middle school JSTP-SCB project batch 7.

open-house.title: KVIS Open House Enrollment Scanner
open-house.description: Engineered the computer vision pipeline that digitises enrolment flows for 2,500+ visitors annually. learned and gained experience with image processing and computer vision AI model and database system. learned and gained experience in real-world machine learning application in a complete workflow.

mentor-singapore.title: Mentor for Juniors' Projects
mentor-singapore.description: The project is working on comparing different text-to-speech models capability on detecting Thai and Singaporean students’ handwriting.

international-camp.title: AI & Data Science Elite Summer Camp
international-camp.description: Collaborated with global peers on datatron challenges spanning sustainability and smart cities. Has show outstanding commitment and perseverance in the level up ice breaker mission, successfully completing daily check-ins for all six tasks during the Datatron Summer Camp.

kvisdom.title: KVISDOM YouTube Channel
kvisdom.description: KVISDOM is a nonprofit educational YouTube channel organized by KVIS students to help elevate the educational system in Thailand. VDO editor editing many clips on the KVISDOM YouTube channel and Production technician controlling the VDO recording, managing the lighting, and operating cameras.

photography.title: KVIS Event Photographer
photography.description: School photographer in major school events such as the teacher appreciation ceremony, KVIS sport festival, art festival, 7th KVIS-ISF, dorm party, and KVIS-MWIT sport festival.Won the third place in the school photographing competition on the topic of “Love Song” in the art festival

school-choir.title: KVIS School Choir · Bass Section
school-choir.description: Contributed to signature performances celebrating school heritage and gratitude. Sang the Wai Khru song on Teacher Appreciation Day to honor and pay respect to our teachers in front of the auditorium.

fisym-club.title: FiSym Club · Vice President
fisym-club.description: Established the club to improve KVIS student personal financial awareness and investment skill. Learned for designing the course syllabus, writing the club proposal, coordinating with teachers, the club president and the club secretary.

animators-club.title: Animator's Tournament Club · President
animators-club.description: Established the club to teach the new skill to the students for the basic 3D modeling technique and animating short animations using Blender to club members in total of 7 students. Managed the team and I am responsible and learned about making the course syllabus, making the club proposal, coordinating with teachers, the club VP, and the club secretary, and teaching the topic of basic 3D modeling and basic lighting.

student-committee.title: KVIS Student Committee · Head of  Information and Technology department
student-committee.description: Managed and Developed the KVIS Student Committee website, where I solved the issued of overlapping meeting room bookings. Previously, reservations were made via Excel sheets on a  shared drive, so I developed a web-based booking system for the solution so that everyone can access real-time information and manage the meeting room schedule. This website helps prevent double bookings and is convenient and friendly to use. Currently, both teachers and students use this system for study room reservations.

student-council.title: KVIS Student Council · Executive
student-council.description: Responsible for the KVIS student president and VP election and directs and shapes the student committee operations from our policies. A party list of the PakPing political party, which has been voted the most by all KVIS students. Before the election day, we participated in the debate and made several promotion posters promoting our policies.

give-got-grown.title: Give Got Grown Volunteer Group · Co-founder
give-got-grown.description: Founder Give Got Grown Volunteer group which I am a head of monitoring and evaluation group activities. Our group created a lot of activities to help the communities near our school and the communities in our home province. First, we raised money by designing and distributing cloth bags and water bottles to buy products and equipment to make muscle exercise machines using pulleys to rehabilitate patients. Created Facebook account Give Got Grown to promote, communicate, advertise the activities. We invited school friends and another school to do the activities to help the people.

award-sistemic-2025.title: Singapore International STEM Innovation Challenge 2025
award-sistemic-2025.description: Represented KVIS with lumineth, an assistive AI for the visually impaired, and secured the Bronze Medal among 64 schools worldwide.

certificates.title: Singapore International STEM Innovation Challenge: Bronze medal

award-immc-2025.title: 11st International Mathematical Modeling Challenge 2025
award-immc-2025.description: Led Thailand’s four-person team to optimize global sports league scheduling with decision-based annealing technique on big data , earning the international Honorable Mention award.

award-newgen-2025.title: Thailand New Gen Inventors Award 2025
award-newgen-2025.description: Developed the food allergen warning platform in titled: “The Food Allergen Warning Program for People with Food Allergies to make life easier” in the health and medicine category and won both the Silver Medal and national Popular Vote among 1,549 teams.

award-ysc-2025.title: 27th Young Scientist Competition 2025
award-ysc-2025.description: Awarded Gold among 508 Projects from 103 Schools for Central and Eastern Center for the research titled "Synthesis speech detection with multi generator Generative Adversarial Networks” in the computer science category

award-hscm-2024.title: High School Mathematical Contest in Modeling 2024
award-hscm-2024.description: Led a 4-member team to create a mathematical model using the SARIMAX autoregression model to solve the problem: “To Play or not to Play: Modeling Future Olympic Games” and received Honorable Mention among 1,055 international teams.

award-simsat-2024.title: Siriraj Mathematics and Science Aptitude Test 2024
award-simsat-2024.description: Placed top three among 1,303 national teams while representing faculty of medicine Siriraj Hospital’s that Math, Physics, Bio and Chemistry knowledge competition.The team consisted of 3 members, and I was responsible for physics and mathematics.

award-tpho-2024.title: 23rd Thailand Physics Olympiad
award-tpho-2024.description: TPhO is one of the most prestigious high school national Physics competitions in Thailand. I was ranked 12th among 30 medalists from 98 participants in national round after multi-round theoretical and experimental finals with Academic Olympiad and Development of Science Education Foundation (POSN).

award-ipst-2024.title: The Institute for the Promotion of Teaching Science and Technology(IPST) Camp 2024
award-ipst-2024.description: Selected from over 10,000 initial applicants nationwide, I advanced through several rigorous selection rounds and was ultimately chosen as one of 33 participants for physics IPST Camp 1 and one of just 17 finalists for physics IPST Camp 2, the final stage in the selection of student entries as national team members from Thailand to the International Physics Olympiad (IPhO) in 2025.

award-amc-2023.title: American Mathematics Competitions (AMC)2023
award-amc-2023.description: Earned Gold Distinction with a score of 120/150 and qualified for the American Invitational Mathematics Examination (AIME).

award-hkimo-2023.title: Hong Kong International Mathematical Olympiad 2023
award-hkimo-2023.description: Achieved Silver Medal for HKIMO heat round while collaborating with international peers on advanced problem solving. HKIMO supports and develops math skills by considering international standards and is directly operated by the Olympiad Champion Education Center (OCEC) in Hong Kong.

award-posn-informatics-2023.title: Second POSN Informatics Training Camp 2023
award-posn-informatics-2023.description: Qualified for Bangkok central region center top 50 Informatics training camp organised by Academic Olympiad and Development of Science Education Foundation (POSN).

award-conrad-2024.title: Conrad Challenge 2023-2024
award-conrad-2024.description: Advanced to the global Innovation Stage in the Energy & Environment category with the eco-sustainable fuel system project. Created the Ecoustica which we dive into the ideas, the scientific principles, and the process of making noise as another source of clean energy into a reality, and I was responsible for creating and developing the product design and the website. I was performed the setup for filming our video with the best quality.

award-amc-2024-amc.title: Australian Mathematics Competition 2024
award-amc-2024-amc.description: Awarded Silver with Global Distinction in the senior division for excellence across algebra, geometry, and probability.

award-cat-2024.title: Computational & Algorithmic Thinking 2024
award-cat-2024.description: Earned national silver (2024) and bronze (2025) with global Distinction ranking from the Australian Mathematics Trust (AMT).
